title: Framework Designs: The Haul All Wald Basket Bag  Pre-Order
content:
Australian bag maker Framework Designs just opened a new pre-order for the updated Haul All Wald 139 basket bag ($238). Let’s check it out…

Designed specifically for the Wald 139 Basket, the Haul All fits all the things you could possibly need (and a lot of things you don’t). The Haul All offers a 25+ liter capacity, secure attachment, a roll-top closure, and four colors. The lead time is 1-2 weeks, currently.

Specs:

  • 38mm detachable shoulder strap for comfortable off bike carrying
  • One large and two small internal, stretchy pockets
  • Roll top closure with your choice of Antique Brass G-Hooks or Black Side Release Buckles
  • Front hooks loop under and around the top rim of the basket in addition to two velcro loops on the back
  • Two easy access back pocket sleeves with drainage holes
  • Daisy chain webbing rows on the back
  • Expandable side pockets with velcro that closes over the rim of the basket (an easy attachment option for throwing in the basket for quick trips)
  • 6mm water, mildew and rot resistant foam on all four sides of the bag for structure, stability and the protection of your possessions
  • 12mm water, mildew and rot resistant foam on the floor of the bag
  • Webbing matrix on the base for attaching straight onto large porteur style racks (Voile Nano Straps recommended)

 

See more at Framework Designs.
